body.p: Which of the following is part of the forebrain but not part of the cerebrum?

response.feedback: Incorrect. This lobe, while deep, is still part of the cerebrum.
Incorrect. This lobe, while deep, is still part of the cerebrum.
Incorrect. This white matter structure connects the two cerebral hemispheres.
Incorrect. This is a specific functional region of the parietal and temporal lobes of the cerebrum.
Correct. This is part of the diencephalon, deep to the cerebrum.
